title: The Stinging Fly
description: For the 20th anniversary of Ireland's leading literary magazine, I built a brand new website, migrated six years of blog posts, implemented a new online store, and made twenty years of great writing available online for the first time.

title: Fallow Media
description: An experimental, reader-funded online arts publication which combines modern web technologies with longform writing and multimedia projects. Also an ongoing journal of my experiments in web design.

title: Royal Society of Antiquarians
description: I completely redesigned the website of one of Ireland's oldest societies, brought their membership process online, and developed a new events management calendar.

title: Tramp Press
description: I wrote custom Wordpress plugins to enhance the website of one of Ireland's leading independent publishers.

title: Paper Visual Art
description: I redesigned the website for this beautiful journal of contemporary art criticism.

title: The Mastersons
description: I brought an aging website up to date for these creative wedding photographers.

title: Grayscale
description: I developed a brand new website for this boundary-pushing audio-visual events company.
